customers.BillingAddress: 200 N Comal St, San Antonio, TX 78207
100 N Lamar St, Fort Worth, TX 76196
customers.Notes: Multi-facility complex - North and South buildings

sites.Notes: One of largest single-site jails in US
Las Vegas metro area primary jail
Mile High City main detention facility

tickets.Title: Access control system offline - main entrance
tickets.Description: Main entrance card readers not responding. Security breach risk. Staff unable to control inmate movement through main checkpoint.

tickets.Title: Camera maintenance - East cellblock blind spots
tickets.Description: Three cameras in East cellblock showing poor image quality. Potential blind spots creating security concerns during shift changes.

tickets.Title: Perimeter alarm false alarms - north fence
tickets.Description: Multiple false alarms from north perimeter sensors. Possibly weather-related or animal interference. Need system calibration.
tickets.Resolution: Technician on-site. Found vegetation growth interfering with beam sensors. Clearing and recalibrating zone 12-15.

tickets.Title: Fire panel system fault - backup power
tickets.Description: Fire alarm control panel showing backup battery fault. System running on main power only - no redundancy.

tickets.Title: Network switch replacement - security zone
tickets.Description: Core security network switch intermittent failures. Multiple camera feeds dropping periodically. Need immediate replacement.

tickets.Title: Access control card reader malfunction
tickets.Description: Main sally port card reader not accepting valid credentials. Staff manually opening doors - security protocol breach.
tickets.Resolution: Onsite technician replacing reader module. Testing in progress.

tickets.Title: Video management server storage full
tickets.Description: Video storage server at 95% capacity. Need to archive old footage and expand storage array.

tickets.Title: Intrusion alarm false positives - cell block
tickets.Description: Cell block motion detectors triggering false alarms during routine cleaning. Need sensitivity adjustment.

tickets.Title: Emergency communication system offline
tickets.Description: Staff emergency communication system completely offline. No intercom or emergency call capability between zones.

tickets.Title: HVAC sensor integration failure
tickets.Description: Building automation system not receiving data from cell block temperature sensors. Climate control operating manually.

tickets.Title: Main entrance card reader damaged
tickets.Description: Visitor entrance card reader physically damaged - appears to be impact damage. Security compromised.
tickets.Resolution: Installing replacement reader. Reviewing security footage for damage cause.

tickets.Title: Perimeter lighting control malfunction
tickets.Description: Perimeter security lighting not following scheduled on/off cycles. Manual override currently in use.

tickets.Title: Visitor management system database error
tickets.Description: Visitor check-in system showing database connectivity errors. Unable to verify visitor backgrounds.

tickets.Title: Cell door lock mechanism jamming
tickets.Description: Multiple cell doors in Block C not locking properly. Mechanical jamming in latch mechanisms - immediate security risk.

tickets.Title: Camera system software update required
tickets.Description: Security camera management software showing end-of-support warnings. Need to schedule upgrade during maintenance window.

tickets.Title: Backup generator communication fault
tickets.Description: Emergency backup generator not communicating with building management system. Auto-start capability unknown.

tickets.Title: Fire suppression system annual inspection
tickets.Description: Mandatory annual inspection of fire suppression system in kitchen and maintenance areas. State compliance requirement.

tickets.Title: Intercom system static interference
tickets.Description: Cell block intercom system experiencing static interference. Communication clarity compromised during shift changes.
tickets.Resolution: Testing audio lines and replacing amplifier components.

tickets.Title: Motion sensor false alarms - exercise yard
tickets.Description: Exercise yard motion sensors triggering during windy conditions. Likely sensitivity too high for outdoor environment.

tickets.Title: Access control server backup failure
tickets.Description: Nightly backup of access control database failing for past week. No current backup in case of system failure.

tickets.Title: Multiple camera feeds intermittent
tickets.Description: Six cameras in north cellblock losing connection intermittently. Pattern suggests network infrastructure issue.

tickets.Title: Elevator security camera installation
tickets.Description: Install security cameras in elevator cars 3 and 4. Required for compliance with new state regulations.

tickets.Title: Air conditioning failure - server room
tickets.Description: Server room HVAC system completely failed. Temperature rising rapidly - risk of equipment damage and system outage.

tickets.Title: Perimeter fence sensor alignment
tickets.Description: Recent earthquake damaged perimeter fence sensors on east side. Multiple zones showing fault conditions.

tickets.Title: Hurricane-damaged camera system
tickets.Description: Recent hurricane damaged 12 exterior cameras. Water infiltration in junction boxes causing system failures.
tickets.Resolution: Replacing water-damaged cameras and weatherproofing connections.

tickets.Title: Cold weather door lock malfunction
tickets.Description: Freezing temperatures causing electronic door locks to malfunction. Multiple secure areas affected.

tickets.Title: Fire alarm system water damage
tickets.Description: Flooding from recent storm damaged fire alarm control panel. System showing multiple faults and may not function properly.
tickets.AssignedTo: Gulf Coast Fire Systems - Rebecca Johnson

tickets.Title: Network infrastructure upgrade
tickets.Description: Upgrade aging network switches in cellblock areas. Current equipment approaching end of life.

tickets.Title: Casino area surveillance expansion
tickets.Description: Install additional cameras in visitor areas due to increased activity from nearby casino district. Compliance requirement.

tickets.Title: Seismic sensor calibration
tickets.Description: Annual calibration of seismic intrusion sensors. Required for earthquake-prone region compliance.

tickets.Title: High altitude equipment adjustment
tickets.Description: Access control readers experiencing issues due to altitude-related pressure changes. Need recalibration for 5280ft elevation.

tickets.Title: Rain sensor false alarms
tickets.Description: Heavy Pacific Northwest rain causing false alarms on rooftop motion sensors. Need weather-resistant settings.
tickets.Resolution: Adjusting sensor sensitivity for wet weather conditions.

tickets.Title: Snow load damage - antenna system
tickets.Description: Heavy snow load damaged rooftop communication antennas. Backup communication systems operational but need primary repair.

tickets.Title: Steel structure corrosion - access points
tickets.Description: Industrial environment causing accelerated corrosion on access control hardware. Preventive maintenance required.

tickets.Title: Desert dust infiltration - camera lenses
tickets.Description: Sonoran desert dust storms coating exterior camera lenses. Image quality severely degraded, need cleaning and protective covers.

tickets.Title: Database server overheating
tickets.Description: Main database server running at critical temperature. Fan failure detected. System may shut down automatically to prevent damage.

tickets.Title: Door controller malfunction - Main entrance backup
tickets.Description: Backup door controller for main entrance is offline. Primary system showing intermittent failures. Need immediate redundancy repair.

tickets.Title: HVAC system failure - Server room cooling
tickets.Description: Server room HVAC unit has failed. Temperature rising rapidly. Critical systems at risk of overheating shutdown.

tickets.Title: Camera system upgrade - East cellblock installation
tickets.Description: Installing three additional high-resolution cameras in East cellblock to eliminate remaining blind spots after maintenance.

tickets.Title: Network switch replacement - Security subnet
tickets.Description: Primary network switch for security systems showing packet loss. Replacing with enterprise-grade switch to ensure reliable camera and access control connectivity.

tickets.Title: Biometric scanner calibration - Processing area
tickets.Description: Two fingerprint scanners in processing area need recalibration. Recent false rejections causing delays in inmate processing.

tickets.Title: Emergency lighting system test failure
tickets.Description: Monthly emergency lighting test revealed 12 fixtures not functioning. Code compliance issue requiring immediate attention.

tickets.Title: Key management system database corruption
tickets.Description: Key management database corrupted during power outage. Unable to track key assignments. Security protocol breach - immediate restoration required.

tickets.Title: Perimeter motion sensor false alarms
tickets.Description: Three perimeter motion sensors triggering false alarms during windy conditions. Need sensitivity adjustment and weatherproofing inspection.

tickets.Title: Fire suppression system inspection - Complete
tickets.Description: Monthly fire suppression system inspection and testing completed successfully. All zones operational.
tickets.AssignedTo: Fire Safety Systems TX - Michael Torres
tickets.Resolution: Completed monthly inspection. All fire suppression zones tested successfully. System operating within normal parameters. Next inspection due October 25th.

tickets.Title: Access card database sync issue - Resolved
tickets.Description: Access card database not syncing with central server. Staff cards showing invalid status.
tickets.Resolution: Database sync issue resolved. Corrupted index files were rebuilt and synchronization restored. All access cards now functioning normally. Implemented daily sync monitoring.

tickets.Title: Camera lens cleaning - East wing complete
tickets.Description: Routine cleaning of camera lenses in East wing due to dust accumulation affecting image quality.
tickets.Resolution: Cleaned 12 camera lenses in East wing. Replaced 2 protective covers. Image quality restored to optimal levels. Scheduled next cleaning for December.

tickets.Title: Backup generator test - Monthly maintenance complete
tickets.Description: Monthly backup generator load test and maintenance inspection.
tickets.Resolution: Generator load test completed successfully. Oil changed, filters replaced, battery connections cleaned. System operational at 100% capacity. Next test scheduled for October 23rd.

tickets.Title: Intercom system repair - Booking area fixed
tickets.Description: Intercom system in booking area not functioning. Staff unable to communicate during processing.
tickets.Resolution: Faulty amplifier replaced in booking area intercom system. All zones tested and operational. Communication restored between booking stations and control room.
